crimsonEyed:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
crimsonEyed:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

crimsonEyed:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
crimsonEyed:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
crimsonEyed:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

crimsonEyed:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
crimsonEyed:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

crimsonEyed:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
crimsonEyed:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !crimsonEyed:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

crimsonEyed:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
crimsonEyed:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !crimsonEyed:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

crimsonEyed:ChidoriBlade.NAME: Chidori Blade
crimsonEyed:ChidoriBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your next Orb.

crimsonEyed:ChidoriStream.NAME: Chidori Stream
crimsonEyed:ChidoriStream.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Lightning.
crimsonEyed:ChidoriStream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Lightning twice.

crimsonEyed:Jolt.NAME: Jolt
crimsonEyed:Jolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger the passive ability of your next Orb. NL Draw 1 card.
crimsonEyed:Jolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger the passive ability of your next Orb twice. NL Draw 1 card.

crimsonEyed:Hatred.NAME: Hatred
crimsonEyed:Hatred.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP.

crimsonEyed:Amaterasu.NAME: Amaterasu
crimsonEyed:Amaterasu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Exhaust.

crimsonEyed:AmaterasuBarrier.NAME: Amaterasu Barrier
crimsonEyed:AmaterasuBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take unblocked attack damage this turn, Channel 1 Dark.

crimsonEyed:Kagutsuchi.NAME: Kagutsuchi
crimsonEyed:Kagutsuchi.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of ALL Dark. NL Evoke your next Orb.
crimsonEyed:Kagutsuchi.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of ALL Dark. NL Evoke your next Orb twice.

crimsonEyed:Fireball.NAME: Fireball Jutsu
crimsonEyed:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card.

crimsonEyed:PhoenixFlower.NAME: Phoenix Flower
crimsonEyed:PhoenixFlower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each card in your Exhaust pile.

crimsonEyed:SureFire.NAME: Sure-Fire
crimsonEyed:SureFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Lock-On, gain [B] and draw 1 card.

crimsonEyed:Genjutsu.NAME: Genjutsu
crimsonEyed:Genjutsu.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

crimsonEyed:PullWires.NAME: Pull Wires
crimsonEyed:PullWires.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shiv to your hand. NL Put a card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.

crimsonEyed:ShadowShuriken.NAME: Shadow Shuriken
crimsonEyed:ShadowShuriken.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shiv to your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

crimsonEyed:Observe.NAME: Observation
crimsonEyed:Observe.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Lock-On to random enemies !M! times.

crimsonEyed:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
crimsonEyed:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card, NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

crimsonEyed:Vantage.NAME: Vantage
crimsonEyed:Vantage.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.

crimsonEyed:SnakeHands.NAME: Snake Hands
crimsonEyed:SnakeHands.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for ALL of your Status and Curse cards.

crimsonEyed:Slither.NAME: Slither
crimsonEyed:Slither.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 Hatreds to your discard pile. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

crimsonEyed:CutDown.NAME: Cut Down
crimsonEyed:CutDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 [B] and Strength.

crimsonEyed:VengefulStrike.NAME: Vengeful Strike
crimsonEyed:VengefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Hatred into your hand.

crimsonEyed:Grudge.NAME: Grudge
crimsonEyed:Grudge.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust up to 1 card.

crimsonEyed:Spite.NAME: Spite
crimsonEyed:Spite.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal Fatal damage, heal !M! HP.

crimsonEyed:ChidoriSpear.NAME: Chidori Sharp Spear
crimsonEyed:ChidoriSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, Lightning hits ALL enemies.

crimsonEyed:KagutsuchiChidori.NAME: Kagutsuchi Chidori
crimsonEyed:KagutsuchiChidori.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Exhaust.

crimsonEyed:Tomoe.NAME: Tomoe
crimsonEyed:Tomoe.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP. NL Gain !M! Orb slots.

crimsonEyed:Perception.NAME: Perception
crimsonEyed:Perception.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !M! cards and discard !M! cards.

crimsonEyed:Kirin.NAME: Kirin
crimsonEyed:Kirin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Focus. NL Evoke all your Orbs. NL End your turn.

crimsonEyed:Amenotejikara.NAME: Amenotejikara
crimsonEyed:Amenotejikara.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

crimsonEyed:Susanoo.NAME: Susanoo
crimsonEyed:Susanoo.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [B] for each time you lose HP this combat. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.

crimsonEyed:IndraForm.NAME: Indra Form
crimsonEyed:IndraForm.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lightning. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.
